metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7810 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
libbluray MountManager class has a time-of-check time-of-use (TOCTOU) racewhen expanding JAR files

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7810` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbluray-bdj - 1:0.9.2-2
libbluray-bin - 1:0.9.2-2
libbluray2 - 1:0.9.2-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libbluray package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.9.2-2').
